description: These easy vegan gluten-free falafel are baked to perfection. They are full of protein, amazing kid food and and can be used in so many ways!
keywords: gluten free falafel, low sugar dinners
name: Baked Vegan Gluten-Free Falafel
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups dried chickpeas (, soaked in water for at least 6 hours)
1 small onion (, coarsely chopped (I used 1 cup)
1 tablespoon tapioca starch (, or any starch of your choice such as potato starch or cornstarch)
1 teaspoon ground coriander (I left this out)
Freshly cracked black pepper (, I used 1/2 teaspoon)
1/2 cup grapeseed oil or neutral oil of your choice (, see notes for oil free)

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the chickpeas and place in a food processor. Add the garlic, onion, parsley, tapioca, cumin, salt, coriander, and pepper to taste. Process on high speed until everything is well blended. Halfway through, turn off the processor and scrape down the sides to incorporate all the ingredients.
Remove the blade from the processor bowl. Scoop a spoonful of mixture into your hand and shape into a ball or egg. Continue with all the mixture.
